message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a fantastic product that I believe you'll find incredibly valuable. Given its potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $950,000. I'm confident this represents a fair deal considering the value it will bring to your endeavors.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice, but I'm not quite ready to commit to $950,000. I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $850,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the value I'll get from the product.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $850,000 is below the value I place on this product. I'm confident it can significantly benefit your business, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $900,000?

I understand your confidence in the product's value, Alice, but $900,000 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'm proposing a counteroffer of $875,000. I think this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.
